Items.text: Well class, that is all the work we have for today.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Make sure to review your notes!
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: You'll have a quiz at the end of the week on the material you've learned.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: That's the bell! Have a good rest of your day!
Items.name: Ms Sparks
